rule: The output should include additional text besides the category name.
input: Economy shows signs of recovery in the last quarter
validityText:
The input "Economy shows signs of recovery in the last quarter" is a short phrase written in plain text format. It is in English language and resembles a headline or part of a news article. These characteristics comply with the input specification, which allows input to be any piece of text including news articles or headlines, and requires the text to be in plain text format and in English. There are no indications of non-compliance, as the input adheres to the guidelines by providing a text in English without any unusual formatting.

OK
